attributes.action: Act to safeguard Britain's future and UK integrity and DO NOT trigger Article 50
attributes.background: It is already alarmingly clear just how disasterous Brexit would be for our economy, for jobs, for the integrity of our United Kingdom, for peace. A repeat vote would undoubtedly deliver a Remain majority. We urge you to act responsibly and in the best interests of all Britons and keep us in the EU.
